description: They have made a line of chunky knits with our own version of the Setesdal pattern, knitted with a fantastic yarn from the Italian spinner Linsieme. This spinner is specialized in cashmere blends and they have fallen in love with this chunky, yet light yarn, made with fine merino wool and cashmere. They have made this classic, zipped sweater that is warm and comfortable. This will be your favorite sweater, guaranteed, this winter!
name: We Norwegians Setesdal Zip Up Pullover - Mens

specs.value: Fits generous- they suggest to size down
